name: Unity of Command II: Desert Fox
description: Your command: the Afrika Korps. Its leader: Gen. Erwin Rommel.

name: When the Devil Takes Hold
description: When The Devil Takes Hold promises to be a bone-chilling journey into the heart of fear, with immersive first-person gameplay, a deep storyline, and a heart-pumping atmosphere.

name: DownhillMadness
description: Shoot hundreds of projectiles and guide them to the goals to make the most money! Complete challenges, unlock levels, and discover new techniques!

name: Unsolved Case: Fatal Clue - Collector's Edition
description: Solve a series of tough cases, full of personal drama! In the new game series, you have to unravel some of the hardest mysteries using both logic and your intuition!

name: The Cullfield Ritual
description: Take part in a dangerous ritual game that requires you to travel between reality and the "Spiritual Realm"

name: The Wonderful Adventures of Sip
description: A story-driven chapter based adventure game that takes place in the year 2064 about a child with supernatural powers. The player takes control of the life and abilities of Sip and makes decisions that will influence his future.

name: Protos Magos
description: Protos Magos is a Spellcrafting FPS with fast-paced combat. Explore a medieval setting and blast your way through a horde of demons. Create custom spells to suit your unique play style.

name: Forge Horizon
description: Forge Horizon is an arcade style shooter with fast-paced gameplay. Customize your weapons and armor by selecting, upgrading, or crafting them.

name: Timeless Heart VR
description: Timeless heart VR is an action VR roguelike game, As the second work of Timeless Stories series, this work further simplifies and enriches the unique sword skill system of the series. Advancing in the unknown labyrinth with Lycanea, and break through this blockade from fate!

name: The Curse of Eclipse
description: This is an adventure and puzzle game inspired by old school games of 1980s like Atic Atac from ZX Spectrum. You walk in a cursed house avoiding enemies and finding keys and magical scrolls. The game is playable with 3rd person, 1st person and top down views. Created by a solo developer.

name: The Last Sword
description: You are the chosen one to save the world of Lunaria. Fantasy game in a medieval and magical RPG world.

name: Chuck the Metalhead in Medieval Hell
description: Become the first Metalhead Ruler of Hell in this illustrated RPG with a fresh approach to the combat system! Recruit a team of hellish freaks, kick the butts of demons to the rythm of metal and decide the fate of souls! All of this in hand-drawn art style inspired by medieval illuminations.

name: How I Escaped Futa Prison
description: How I Escaped Futa Prison is a top-down shooter where you play as a futa escaping from prison. Shoot your way through the prison and slap your enemies with your giant penis.

name: Eeeek Abyss
description: Eeeek Abyss is a Cthulhu style multi-player platform game. Up to 4 players in 1 screen in co-op multi-player game. Let's destroy as you wish, and search the secrets hidden in the cities!

name: Every Summer Holiday
description: While visiting a small town during the summer holiday, Henry meets two older boys named Jason and Eddie. The three hang out daily, and Henry starts seeing them as his older brothers. Henry has to say goodbye to his friends when the holiday ends, but they will reunite another summer.

name: They Love Them
description: They Love Them is a romantic match-3 puzzle game. Impress your date by showering them with gifts and affection. Match 3 gifts to send them to your partner. Quickly send gifts to maintain a combo. Play in a relaxing date mode, or rack up points as quickly as you can in the Speed dating mode!

name: Alight in the Dark
description: Alight in the Dark is a reverse bullet hell survival game where players use abilities and equipment to survive. Unlock characters and upgrade base stats as you play, in a world where humanity has split light into five main elements, with a mysterious sixth. Make strategic decisions to survive.

name: Demolition Party
description: Demolition Party is a 4 player online multiplayer car party game. Enjoy unique maps and use tons of different guns to "demolish" your friends!

name: Deep Assault
description: Test your attention by keeping your rapidly descending character away from the green lights and avoid the deadly machine coming towards you from above as fast as you can! and compete with yourself by scoring more with each try!

name: Vivid Tale
description: Hear the Vivid Tale! Let the cards and the story they tell take you to Sklavinia, a land ruled by mighty Chosen of Gods. Fight the monsters, seduce the beauties, investigate the secrets, but do not forget: you still need to put a new tsar on the throne.

name: Hello, Lucia
description: Bullet Hell x Rogue-like! "Hello, Lucia" is a game that mixes bullet hell shooter with rogue-like elements. Collect relics to strengthen your ship, mow down hordes of enemies, and break through randomly generated stages!

name: The Open World Survival Craft Hunters
description: Inspired by the hunting action of fighting giant monsters, this title combines open-world survival crafting to create a new experience. While surviving in a procedural generated world, players can hunt giant monsters, create weapons and armor, and tame monsters.

name: TinyTiny
description: "Be a hero to save the Tiny Kingdom from crisis!" Experience a variety of exciting VR games!

name: Bosses
description: Let's boss battle!

name: Knights of Dice
description: Knights of Dice is a dice-rolling game, which aims to please gamers that are into boardgames, turnbased games, strategy, and a sprinkle of party-RPG and rougelite.

name: Super Fantasy Kingdom
description: A rougelite city builder set in a relaxing fantasy world. Explore and rebuild your kingdom to bring it back to its former glory. Defeat hordes of enemies with an always unique team of defenders. Harvest, capture, build, mine, cook, brew, feed and grow. But be prepared to watch it all burn!

name: Sector 666: The Forgotten Zone
description: You've lived in Sector 666 for most of your life. While surviving is difficult, you've been awoken to the harsh truth about the city. Greedy corporations have trashed the sector, and the Government spreads propaganda through all outlets. Will you fight back and find happiness again?

name: Chainmail Bikini
description: Join Brandi the Red and her heroic companions as they hunt monsters for fun and profit in this RPG game!

name: Deer Crusade
description: An original and modern 2D adventure taking place in a vast (and cursed) world full of deadly creatures and clever puzzles.

name: The Kill Zone
description: In the future, the #1 network tv show in the world is The Kill Zone. It's also the deadliest! Murder waves of attackers with weapons ranging from medieval to sci-fi, as they charge at you with wiffle ball bats and paintball guns. Play alone, or with up to three friends in multiplayer co-op.

name: Knocking Up My Nympho Neighbors
description: Take care of the residents of a dormitory for hard working women, who need to blow off steam after a long day at work. After all, home is where the harem is.

name: Oztrich: An Adventure
description: A 2D adventure set in the world of Oztrich. Explore and uncover the mysteries of this retro world full of unique and exciting monsters!

name: Colourblind
description: Manipulate Colour and Machines to solve mind-bending puzzles and explore a Colourless sci-fi world

name: Omsi 2: Digibus Mirage
description: The Omsi 2 Add-on Digibus Mirage includes detailed exterior and interior models in two body lengths, the 850 and the 920.

name: Incessant
description: Incessant is a first-person survival horror game created to bring you hell on earth. As Dan Wallace, Explore, Run, Hide and try to survive the butcher... If you can.

name: New Yankee: Karma Tales
description: A normally-steady stream of silk, spices and other curiosities into Camelot has dried up and it’s down to John, Mary and friends to find out why! What happened to the raja who usually ships these goods? Is he in danger or is there another reason for his disappearance?

name: Astral Coconut
description: A skating based adventure in a vast alien world.

name: Argh!
description: Play as one of the legendary captains in the world of Argh! Compete against 6 other players in an arena and become the greatest threat to the Seven Seas. Prepare your arsenal by looting nearby islands, sink your opponents, and brave the Oblivion to win and sweep the board!

name: Star-Crosst
description: Earth has just survived a decade of war against an invading alien species, and the younger generation has been given an opportunity to restart their lives. Explore a deep, immersive character study set in a futuristic world about relationships, our purpose in life and the paths we make for ourselves

name: In the Weeds
description: Play as a walking flower and restore life to the forest! Navigate obstacles, fend off pests, and overcome environmental hazards to create a thriving ecosystem. Join us in the weeds and help bring the beauty of nature back to life!

name: Nofsky Zombies
description: Fight off waves of zombies with friends or go solo as you explore various maps, characters, and weapons! Here you will find all of your favorite 3D printed assets designed by your favorite creators! From well known designs to unreleased beta projects, Nofsky Zombies has it all!

name: Ruined Kingdom
description: Ruined Kingdom is a real-time strategy, RPG, and route attack game. Defeat the insolent humans and take from them whatever your heart desires, CONTROL the battlefield, Defeat rival tribes! Take control of an army of Orcs fighting to conquer! Win and gain experience to unlock new upgrades.

name: Escape Memoirs: Mini Stories - Bunker Scenario
description: This DLC is an additional scenario for "Escape Memoirs: Mini Stories", in which the player must make their way through an old emergency shelter to escape.

name: Mortal Glory 2
description: Manage a team of traveling gladiators in this turn-based fantasy roguelike. Find the best recruits, collect powerful loot and discover clever tactics on the battlefield. The tournament awaits those who desire Mortal Glory!

name: Decks of Power
description: Decks of power is an action rougelite deck-building game with a twist. Players are not allowed to discard unwanted cards and must figure out strategic opportunities to use them against the enemy. Enemies level up each time you defeat them in battle and are stronger when you encounter them again.

name: Sker Ritual: The Quiet Ones
description: Do not panic…don't even breathe! The Quiet Ones are back for a brand new DLC for Sker Ritual including a new mask and Premium menu background and more!

name: A Promise Best Left Unkept
description: Harry finally made a huge breakthrough in his quest for success by scoring a major deal for his company, but what he didn’t foresee is that this would unintentionally invite an undesirable presence into his life. The representative of the subcontracting company—his old bully from high school.

name: Hotloop
description: Hotloop is a dynamic mix of old school arcade and simulation. In the game you will meet a realistic system of spacecraft behavior and pricise orbital mechanics. You have to curb the force of gravity of the planets in order to repulse numerous enemies.

name: Halls of Torment
description: Slay hordes of terrifying monsters in this casual roguelite action rpg. Descend into the Halls of Torment where the lords of the underworld await you. Treasures, magic trinkets, and a growing cast of heroes will grant you the power to vanquish the horrors from beyond. How long can you survive?

name: Void: Edge of Existence
description: Take part in the Epic Adventure of Andral as he overcomes multiple Trials within the Edge of his own Existence to Reclaim his Soul.

name: Rogue Tank
description: Rogue Tank is a chaotic 3D tank shooter with rogue-lite elements. — Shoot, zap, burn and crash through waves of elite enemies. Enhance your tank by creating deadly combinations of upgrades and become a force of mass destruction!

name: Adorable Witch 5: Lingering
description: Adorable Witch 5: Lingering is a relaxed and casual level decryption game, which still continues the magical worldview setting of the previous game. You need to guide pure water to fall on the seeds by destroying the stone slabs in the scene to ensure the growth of the seeds.

name: Idle Devils
description: Idle Devils is a leisure strategic placement game. In addition to rich roles, skills and equipment systems, you can also freely choose the devil to cultivate. Through her, you can conquer new female demons, and finally complete the salvation of the Demon World, becoming a real Demon King.

name: Doloc Town
description: This game is a pixel art simulation game & shooting game, it has cute picture, semi-open world story system, rich and deep game system. The story is witty, lighthearted and casual, you can build your own farm, tackle cute Npcs, catch small animals, learn food recipes or fight monster in jungle-land

name: Godsend Arena
description: Take control of the gods as they fight to regain their power in Godsend Arena！

name: Catacombs: The Asper Case
description: In 1804, doorman Philibert Asper's body was found in the Catacombs of Paris. His death remains unsolved to this day. This VR experience takes you 20 feet underground to uncover the truth about his demise. Find out what lurks in the darkness, but make no mistake, spirits never come alone.

name: Citadel Stormer 2
description: Blast your way through a world of deadly robots and monstrous machines in this explosive run-and-gun action platformer inspired by '90s classics!

name: Exalted Seracthon
description: A Sci-Fi psychological horror, Exalted Seracthon puts you in the role of an untrained psychic in the throws of their emerging power. You have sensed a presence lurking just behind the veil of reality, and must survive its attention long enough to find your own path.

name: Spiral Dystopia
description: Kou, the descendant of a family that manages a deserted shrine, meets a mysterious woman called Miyu who wanders the streets at night with a bamboo sword. When Kou and Miyu discover the ancient book that Miyu is searching for, lightning strikes and the world begins to spiral.

name: Centauri's Favourite Archer
description: Ten years after the events of the Albino Hunter, Aline Andrews lives a quiet life in Centauri along with her brother's family. But, when her brother's pregnant wife gets sick with an unknown illness, Aline must journey outside her comfort zone and face the perils of rest of the world...

name: Scary Pictures: Yavez - Seven Deadly Sins
description: Scary Pictures: Yavez - Seven Deadly Sins in the novel-horror genre. The game will plunge you into the atmosphere of the classic and gloomy history of the Soviet times. You have to face many life choices that will have consequences and lead to one of eight endings.

name: AutoSim 2
description: A text based motorsport management game where users challenge themselves to take their race team to the championship!

name: Echoes of the Plum Grove
description: A new life awaits you in Honeywood! Build a thriving farming community that will last generations in this cozy farm simulator. Farm, socialize, make friends, cook, craft, forage, and uncover the secrets of the island! And if someone doesn’t want to be friends? There are always other means.

name: Now You Would Destroy the Earth
description: A top-down psychological horror adventure. After a letter from a lover thought long-lost, a man takes a job as a research scientist in a city torn apart by a strange disease.

name: Clouds Ahoy!
description: Clouds Ahoy! is a frantic coop multiplayer game. Alone or with up to four friends you make up the crew of a flying Skyship. Fight alien monsters, maintain the onboard systems, complete deliveries, and upgrade your Skyship to survive between the clouds.

name: Kurenai Maid Tycoon
description: Become a theme restaurant tycoon and lead your chain of Maid Cafés to success. Manage the operation of your own Maid Café and customize it to your style! You will be able to manage suppliers, workers, decorations and much more!

name: Superstein
description: Während seines längst überfälligen Urlaubs auf der Osterinsel, den er sich nach der letzten Schlacht auf Vargo verdient hatte, erfährt der Held von spurlos verschwundenen Inselbewohnern. Was es damit wohl auf sich hat und wo ist eigentlich der Osterhase?

name: The Big Mining
description: Welcome to Mininghill, a place full of life and challenges. Here, you'll meet Ayla, a tarlok who is about to start a journey to become a great miner while dealing with the pressure of being the daughter of the biggest miner in Mininghill.

name: Tick, Tank, Boom
description: Tick, Tank, Boom is an arcade multiplayer-shooter where players fight each other in various game modes like free for all, domination or capture the flag. A large selection of tanks will give you everything you need to find your perfect playstyle to succeed on the battlefield.

name: Recovery Syndicate
description: Recovery Syndicate is a prequel to Abeyance, in which you are the leader of one of the factions trying to reconstruct the economy of the galaxy. You must build and manage your colony's resources carefully, while watching out for rival factions who are also vying for supremacy.

name: Penguin with a Pumpgun
description: Get ready for the zombie penguins! Penguin with a Pumpgun is a 2D retro-inspired roguelike set in a zombie infected hospital. Gun your way through 13 floors of horror and escape the hospital, while upgrading your character and weapon. Can you get to the ground floor to make your escape?

name: Araka: JK Exorcist Horror RPG
description: Manipulate the main character with power of telepathic, looking for the trace of Araka, an Exorcist imprisoned in the other world.

name: Our Mini Adventure
description: A relaxing walking simulator game. Explore beautiful locations, share stunning vistas. Master magic spells

name: Shy Cats: Hidden Orchestra
description: Shy Cats Hidden Orchestra is a hidden object game where you need to find musician cats that are embarassed to play their music. When you find them, they will play songs for you.

name: Unwound
description: Lose yourself in a surreal candyland adventure about transformation and escapism. Descend into a land of weirdos and forgotten memories as you assemble a new you from whatever you find.

name: Exquisite Fishing
description: Exquisite Fishing is a casual fishing game. In this adventure, you'll need to improve your fishing to its best to be able to catch every single creature in the ocean! What mysteries does the ocean hold?

name: Big Survivor
description: Survive, with a smile on your face! Fight your way through the scribbles, as you power up and become stronger. Vibe with the tornadoes and get a useless pet. Increase your sucking and suck away!!!!!!?

name: Probo Rush
description: Probo Rush is a classic shoot 'em up bullet hell game with a boss rush twist. Fight against machines, aliens, and nature as you take on ten challenging boss battles. With adjustable health and an Assist Mode, Probo Rush offers a challenging but accessible gaming experience.

name: Death Angel Nightmare
description: Death Angel Nightmare is a traditional RM horror character adventure game with single story and multiple death achievements. The story length is less than 2 hours.Matsushita and Taojing are a loving couple, but they are caught in the chase. Why is this?

name: Dominator Idle
description: Dominator Idle is the ultimate idle game for world domination. Train troops and purchase magical upgrades in order to takeover the entirety of earth. With a powerful prestige system you can grow your power to unfathomable standards allowing to your conquer stronger versions of Earth.

name: 1Week
description: 1Week is a PvE sandbox in which you'll live in a post-apocalyptic world of exploration and survival in the underground by looting, building, crafting, farming, and fighting. Be self-sufficient before your week’s supplies run out.

name: PhotonVerse
description: PhotonVerse is a puzzle precision 2d platformer set in a neon universe. Play 100 stages through 10 themed worlds each with its own mechanics.

name: Exhibitors
description: Deep within the clouds of a gas giant, supermassive creatures occupy the sky, each exhibiting an ecosystem. Exhibitors is a Factory building game with elements of farming and exploration.

name: University Love Affair
description: University life is always interesting. It is full of romance, dreams and plans for the future. Derek Winters is a university student. Difficulties appeared on his way, having passed which he will be able to find harmony, love and everything he wants. His fate is in your hands. YOU can help him or...

name: Rise and Fall: Bronze Age
description: Rise & Fall: Bronze Age is a Grand Strategy game set in the Bronze Age between 3400BC and 1150BC. Expand your power by diplomacy and war and manage your troublesome elites. Feed your people, build temples for your gods and tombs for your rulers. How high can you rise before your empire fall ?

name: Highrollers
description: High Rollers is a action shooter, heavily focuses on boss battles. Inspired by western and Teslapunk world settings. You're a former bounty hunter who wants to take his revenge on the corrupt corporations and ignite a revolution. Handle powerful weapons, roll dice, define your "fate”.

name: VideoHole: Episode II
description: Fall down further. Find them where they have always been. Help them remember. Explore multiple worlds, solve mysteries, and set your retail-hardened will against a mysterious cosmic force in the second installment of the beloved videohole series.

name: ExtremeRetroArena
description: ExtremeRetroArena is a classic arcade style shoot 'em up where you must fly around and use spells to avoid contact with enemy spacecraft. The game uses a modernized and stylized version of classic arcade graphics and effects.

name: Noxia Somnia
description: Fight nightmarish foes in this action-horror exploration of psychological fears manifested. Understand, overcome, and confront anxiety and survive the twisted toxic reflection of life's challenges.

name: Hunted: Kalevala
description: Get your knife, get your spear. There is a monster on the loose. Shout Perkele, and kill the beast.

name: Brxken Inside
description: Shion's calm and measured life comes to an end when she meets Akiko. This encounter has the chance to change her life or plunge it further into the abyss of depression and hopelessness.

name: Hentai EroCum
description: Hentai EroCum is a relaxing puzzle game. Enjoy 6 different themes, 36 sexy girls and over 80 beautiful and erotic images. Complete the puzzle and then shake the pictures to reveal more explicit content.

name: Fog Horror
description: Fog Horror - psychological horror game. You'll fall into oppressive atmosphere here. Watch out hostile entities entire the viscose void!

name: Ninja vs. Zombies
description: 2D ninja action game in the Metroidvania style of exploration. The game is influenced by games from the 8bit/16bit era, with a focus on the Metroid and Castlevania series. Explore vast dungeons and destroy the "Demon King," the avenger of the ninja clan!

name: Emergency Crew 2: Global Warming
description: Hurricanes are raging in Sunland! Once again, Stephen Shepard leads an Emergency Crew to help people in their hour of need and get to the bottom of what's going on.

name: Pip D
description: Pip D - cute puzzle game with pipes. Enjoy a relaxing time connecting pipes.

name: Chester: Into the Light
description: Your once favorite plush toy now torments your mind. Find your way out of the nightmares each night, and bring your fears into the light.

name: Gravity VR
description: Gravity VR is a unique short interactive experience in a surreal world with no ground beneath your feet, where everything is forever falling. You'll meet two old brothers living a surprisingly ordinary life... But nothing lasts forever.

name: Rune It Out
description: Short Description: Rune it Out is a multiplayer PVP game where you and your fellow RuneMages combine runes into spells to blast each other. One wrong incantation and you'll blast. Don't blow it

name: Geometry May. I swear it's a nice free game
description: I swear it's a nice runner game

name: Return From Core
description: Explore the Inner Earth world and its mysteries in this survival sandbox adventure game! Dig for materials to craft new gear and defend your camp against the creatures and perils of the Core. If you recover the technology lost after the catastrophe, maybe one day you can return to the surface!

name: Becrowned
description: Surreal survival horror in a world standing between reality and dreams. Unravel all the mysteries of the dark world, escape from your own fears, and explore the terrifying world where fire no longer burns.

name: HotBunz
description: Hot Bunz is a physics-based 2D Platformer Party Game with one goal - players must navigate their characters through an obstacle course with rotating rings to collect as many gold coins in a series of increasingly complex levels.

name: Car Rental Simulator
description: Open a rental car at the legendary American Route 66. Fulfill your dreams, meet the needs of your customers, compete with your competitors.

name: Just Another Life
description: Just Another Life is a narrative-driven "life simulation" visual novel mixed with adventure game puzzle elements. Play as John Doe, a citizen of the town Hope. Help John learn the stories of the various characters of Hope, and help him overcome the hurdles to his own happiness.

name: Bad Friends Shooter
description: Play against your friends on one device in this action packed game! Available for up to 4 players on one device.

name: New Spring: Survival
description: New Spring is a open world zombie survival RPG where you spend the daytime exploring and scavenging for tools and weapons, and defend your base when night falls. How long can you stave off the hordes?

name: Dance World
description: A sea of communication - talk with friends, join clubs, take a walk through game chats! New acquaintances - find friends, create relationships, play a magnificent wedding, become the most stylish couple! More than 5 thousand musical compositions to choose from, more than 10 dance modes!

name: Hole in Won
description: Create the golf course by laying down tiles in the correct order. Play 100 handcrafted levels, create your own, or check out others in the Arcade.

name: Tanky Tanks 2
description: Tanky Tanks 2 is an intense, fast-paced tank shooter game. It is fun, easy to learn, and addicting. Play alone, together with friends or against your friends, and show your navigation and reaction skills in 6 different game modes and countless levels.

name: Citadelic
description: Citadelic is a base building and defending strategy game with roguelite elements. Survive against waves of constantly evolving enemies while expanding your base and managing resources.

name: Gates of Everforge
description: Gates of Everforge is a multiplayer action roguelike with co-op and PVP modes. Each match you'll choose a class, loot powerful gear sets, upgrade your abilities and unlock game changing perks. Fight for survival in co-op Horde PVE mode or face other teams in Raid PVP mode.

name: Gurei
description: An action platformer where you face challenging enemies inspired by Japanese mythology and acquire their powers. Choose your fights in any order, knowing that each opponent gets stronger as the game progresses!

name: Flamingo Go With Gun
description: You are a strong flamingo! And there is no way to allow bloodsuckers to destroy your homeland!

name: Native Hunter
description: Inspired by an existing indigenous tribe, where they live on an island called "North Sentinel Island". Native Hunter gives the player the possibility of living the experience in the body of an indigenous person completely isolated from society, just like the Sentinelese do.

name: United Assault: World War 2
description: Fight on land, sea and air in an open world rogue lite FPS set in authentic theatres of of World War 2.

name: Fortune Familia
description: Sebastian Kittorio joins the Meowfia in order to figure out what happened to his father. However, a simple mystery and a life-changing decision turns to madness as Sebastian faces danger he never would have expected.

name: 2D Dawg 2
description: A Russian visual novel with anthropomorphic dogs.

name: Hljod
description: Hljod is an adventure rhythm game set in a mysterious world inspired by Northern and Eastern European legends. Explore dreamlike locations, learn new melodies, and defeat monsters in musical duels. Restore color to the world and achieve creative ascension.

name: Tales of Tsuki: Moon Guardians
description: Follow the journey of Miyuki and her fellow priestesses of the goddess Tsuki on an exciting adventure through the lands of Getsuga, battling fierce monsters and exploring and meeting the characters in this land full of mystery and wonder where an ancient evil roams the shadows.

name: From the Bunker
description: In «From The Bunker» you play as a group of survivors who have found a fortified bunker and are trying to survive in a world filled with the living dead. You'll have to explore the map in search of resources, fight off threats and build relationships with factions. Do whatever it takes to survive!

name: Snowball Fight Game
description: Snowball Fight Game is a one button, bullet-hell action game, featuring progressively difficult hand-crafted levels and bosses. It pays homage to retro-flash games of old with its simple controls and satisfying gameplay.

name: Little Land War SRPG
description: Turn-based, Fantasy Strategy RPG (SRPG). With a simple UI, you can play lightly. Various battlefields await you: plain, mountain, lake, volcanoe, labyrinth, castle. Each character grows in battle. Recruit ancient tribes and defeat enemy soldiers and monsters.

name: Gone Man
description: GONE MAN is a micro horror room escape game. You will be a private detective, travelling back to the 1893 British town, to investigate the truth behind years of unsolved cases. Faced with the mass clues, standing at the crossroads of the cruel truth, what choice will you make?

name: Wingsuit Hero
description: A pose control game by using a camera in which players are incarnated as a wingsuit hero, fly through mountains, lakes, trees, cliffs, rivers, sea,islands,canyon, tunnels, clounds etc. With an AI system embeded, players can experence seemingly realistic flying, and design an air line oneself.

name: Royal Affairs
description: At your exclusive boarding school, will you rule the roost or be a royal disaster? Court publicity, sway the fate of nations, and find love!

name: Manor Maze
description: Have you ever dreamed about being trapped in a manor where the architecture is a maze? Understandable, but unfortunately that will be happening. Where each maze has its own mechanic, will you be able to decipher them to free yourself from a place where it seems like you have no allies.

name: Virnap
description: Virnap is a 3D horror game planned to release in 2023 made primarily for VR that will get you into a nightmare especially chosen for you from your fears.

name: Samba Space Parade
description: Take your parade to the end of the universe. Samba Space Parade is an action puzzle game full of cute characters and quirky music. Recruit new players, upgrade members, and earn money as you tour the galaxy, aiming for the highest scores and entertaining the cutest alien audiences.

name: Conflux
description: Date! Fight! Collect! Conflux is a collectible visual novel card game featuring a medieval fantasy setting with unique card battle mechanics and character hangout events. Lead the efforts to stop dark magician Eloise from brining ruin to the peaceful lands and uncover the power of Conflux.

name: Cow Girl 2
description: Our farm is the best! Here you will find the most beautiful cows in the whole neighborhood. They bask in the sun all day long and enjoy fragrant herbs. I am sure you will get yourself the most beautiful cow, and she will give you a lot of milk in gratitude!

name: No Fly Drone
description: Take command and defend Earth against the endless Drone invasion. Develop your defense using a combination of towers, abilities, and elemental upgrades.

name: Dungeon of Theseus
description: Dungeon of Theseus is a Rogue-lite deckbuilding auto-battler. Enjoy the fun of deckbuilding without the hassle of playing cards. At the beginning of each round, three characters will be drawn from the deck, and the combat will proceed automatically.

name: Minions of Steel
description: Playing as a clone of GEENEE, you will construct your minions as you dare. You will train them with the best tactics and you will feel the pain of their death. But fear not! As a GEENEE, you have the power to bring the dead back to life and make the weak strong!

name: Triple Canopy no Majo
description: Sin descripción

name: Edenfall: Legacy of the First Wardens
description: A story-driven action adventure combining exploration with combat. Untangle the mysteries of Eden - a forgotten realm as Venya. With help of Alkina the Spirit Fox you gain magic powers and learn how to transform into animals, unleashing their unique skills to restore the Crystal of Light.

name: Remorses
description: Remorses is a first person psychological horror game that delivers an immersive, horrific and absolutely terrifying experience through investigation and surviving in sinister enviroments. Solve puzzles, explore, craft your way to freedom and most importantly, stay alive by any means necessary.

name: Treasure Hunter VR
description: Metal detecting in virtual reality.

name: Consortium VR
description: Become Consortium Bishop Six, a global peacekeeper in the year 2042. Introducing V.O.I.C.E.: speak and form relationships with the entire crew of Zenlil using your own voice. Experience VR Interactive Cinema - take an active role in a murder mystery, on a plane, in the future. Every choice counts.

name: Slay the Zone
description: Face hundreds of monsters, upgrade your equipment and try to survive as long as you can. In this Action Roguelite choose from a variety of upgrades, unlock unique characters and create the best build to slaughter everyone in your path!

name: Pirates Republic
description: Fight dangerous battles on the high seas with Pirate’s Dynasty, grab your friends and collect valuable booty in multiplayer mode and build your stronghold. Together with your crew you will rule the huge procedurally generated world as a notorious buccaneer.

name: Cop Simulator
description: Cop Simulator will let you take on the role of a police officer, and you will have to deal with all the challenges that come with the job. From responding to emergencies, to investigating crimes, to making arrests, you will have to do it all.

name: Imperial Ambitions
description: Discover and colonize the world, Allocate your labor force, Monopolize markets, Fight tactical battles, Survive the age of imperialism as the world turns into a war zone.

name: Sinister Sacrifice
description: Sinister Sacrifice is a first person psychological horror game.locked in a dark room, under the threat of an Asthma attack and the fear of the darkness and that unknown woman who is she? Play as Edward finds himself inside a room that resembles his grandmother's bedroom.

name: TactiCube
description: TactiCube is a puzzle and tactic game where you terraform your environment to put it to good use against an army of construction mechs. Anticipate, manipulate and terminate your opponents to free your kingdom from its evil queen.

name: Dreaming Isles
description: A colorful sandbox action RPG and life sim that combines sword and sorcery, high seas adventure, farming, and relationship building. Unite the clans of the Dreaming Isles, farm the land, start a family, and find your purpose.

name: Samurai of the Lanterns
description: Guide the Lantern Keeper through the malignant forest in this action-packed rouge-lite with Samurai-style fighting, fast-paced combats, chaotic boss encounters and unforgiving difficulty.

name: Landbound
description: A refreshing fantasy RPG PvPvE action filled adventure! Delve solo or band with friends to challenge mythical islands filled with majestic treasures and treacherous monsters or you may like to take a step back, relax, build your own island and farm your lands to your hearts content!

name: Merchant Legends: The Founding
description: Build a new town in a vibrant retro fantasy world... Gather resources, recruit citizens, trade goods and grow your empire to push back the forces of evil!

name: Big Boss: A Villain Simulator
description: An asymmetrical roguelite experience where the player is the boss, fighting heroes for rank in EVILLC to become the final boss. Equip spells, lay traps, and take command of minions to ensure your rise to the top!

name: Hot Babes
description: In this 2D puzzle you have the responsibility to arrange your hot friends in a way that they fit in space. Hot Babes comes with 80 handcrafted levels and a variety of babes of all shapes and sizes.

name: Urbex Night Security
description: Horror game based on tension and story. In 1996, some student begins working as a night guard at an abandoned factory on the outskirts of Berlin. There are many unsettling legends surrounding this place, including rumors of people disappearing.

name: Golfing In Aether: Winter
description: The second free expansion to Golfing in Aether, introducing a snowy winter landscape along with several new levels.

name: Dungeon Dot Ruby
description: Delve into the Master Dungeon as you explore the unyielding tunnels from a top-down view or hop and bop through expansive caverns in 2d-sidescrolling action! Danger and discovery are to be found wherever you are in this retro-style adventure!

name: In the Building: Cats 2
description: is a game in which you have to find all the cute cats. Cats will hide in all houses. Come into the house and search every corner of the room, move the pillows, open the nightstands, check the toilet... Cats can hide in the most unpredictable places.

name: Flutter Away
description: Enjoy the serenity of the Amazon rainforest in this cozy short nature exploration game. As a butterfly researcher on a five-day campaign trip, explore nearby tracks, take photos, meet animal friends, and journal the discoveries found along the way!

name: Jetpack George!
description: Jetpack George! is a fun and addictive endless runner where George the cat must try to eat all the cans of tuna without getting wasted by rockets!

name: Endalor
description: Endalor is medieval dark fantasy survival RPG for 1-4 players. Explore, survive, build, craft, fight and conquer your way through the dark, brutal and mysterious lands of Endalor.

name: Wreck it! VR
description: Who said therapy had to be boring?? Wreck it! VR allows you to smash your way through various scenarios! Pick up or create your own tools and smash, smash, SMASH!

name: Robot Room Cleaner
description: Robot Room Cleaner is a satisfying and fun robot vacuum simulator game

name: Rebels: Under the Spell of Magic - Chapter 3
description: A Visual Novel game about adventure, fantasy, magic and friendship. This is a continuation of Chapter 2. There are only a few choices that can be made, and some paths to choose from. The decisions do not have an impact on the ending, instead they provide slightly different content.

name: Battle Bros.
description: A hand drawn, turn-based, card battling hybrid. Collect cards and build your deck to conquer your opponents! Outwit and ultimately outplay them with a superior strategy!

name: I Am Lewis
description: A 2D side-scrolling survival game where you play as an ordinary man in extraordinary circumstances. LOOT a beautiful pixel art city, FIGHT sinister monsters, and ESCAPE before it's too late!

name: Hyperhell
description: HYPERHELL is a breakneck top-down movement shooter featuring the talents of several prolific hyperpop musicians. Obliterate your way through a colorful city of demons to reclaim what was stolen from you: a fully stocked fridge.

name: Quest Master's Realm
description: Realtime Action Combat MMORPG. Battle Foes and Complete Quests to Level up your Skills and Equipment, ready to face the most Mythic of Enemies. Swap between different Skill Sets whilst playing as the Same Character. Craft and Discover New Items of increasing Rarity.

name: Baker Business 3
description: Manage your very own bakery. Discover recipes, bake tasty treats and sell them to your customers. Unlock upgrades such as ovens and display shelves to expand your bakery. Customize the interior and exterior style to create your dream bakery.

name: Voron
description: You are a raven with an important task: guiding lost souls to their new home. In this story-driven adventure game, you will learn how to fly, explore a Norse-inspired, tiny open world, and don’t forget to croak from time to time — that's what a raven does, right?

name: GrundHeim
description: GrundHeim Player would explore a world from a bird's-eye view. The game would feature a unique crafting and skill-searching mechanic, the player would encounter challenging enemies and obstacles, requiring them to use their skills and crafting abilities to overcome them.

name: Have You Herd?
description: Round up cantankerous critters and complete challenging levels in action-packed missions with your herdin’ buddies. Use all your dogs’ abilities to get them critters back in their pens. Herd up!

name: Spectre's Library
description: Libraries have always been home to hundreds of stories that can take you on a grand adventure, and Spectre's Library is no exception. From an evil clone to a homeless man with a guitar, there's a story for everyone!

name: Pot Farmer
description: Pot Farmer is a simple 2D pixel art farming game.

name: Zwaard
description: Explore a world where you try to preserve the still existing life forms. Technology has taken over and will try it's best to stop you in your adventure. Whilst those technologies try to stop you they could also be the only reason you're still alive.

name: A Desert Christmas Story
description: Fly around an infinitely generated world as Santa with a mouse-based flying controller. Deliver presents to households with a blue exclamation mark, coal to houses with a red exclamation mark, and Christmas Cheer to those with a boomstick! Dodge missiles being shot at you and deploy counter ELFlares

name: Do or Die: Hunt to Survive
description: Connect with your friends and strangers to play the game. Play two different maps and modes. Enter the level with your companions and solo to pick up different types of weapons, weapon ammo, and some powerup player abilities buff.

name: Robot Programmer
description: Uncover your hidden programming talent! Code your own robots with simple instructions to explore 40+ logical based puzzles.

name: Quadremor
description: A first person shooter where you take a role of one of the last human mercenaries, who has to take his revenge for annihilation of humanity. A deep dive into a dark and unforgiving realm, which will stay in your consciousness for ages.

name: Goblin Dungeons
description: Goblin Dungeons - is roguelike game. One fine evening the girl Ellie decided to get away and entertain herself. But the beloved vibrator was electrocuted and sent her to heaven. But her journey is not over. The local deity reborn her in another world in order to save him from the invasion of goblins

name: A Lone Piece
description: Easy to learn. Hard to master. A Lone Piece is a chess themed puzzle game where you control a single pawn caught in the middle of opposing hostile pieces. Your main job is to escape the board, but sometimes offence is the best defense. Become more than just A Lone Piece.

name: Contractor
description: Complete different missions, with various objectives, from legendary contracts, in which you will find different challenges. Invade, steal and destroy different locations.

name: Rescape
description: Rescape is a 2D vertical-scrolling action-adventure game. The player controls a child who goes on a journey to see the outside of the underworld. Climbing the seamless world, the player will make friends, get equipment for climbing, fight enemies, and discover the secret of the world.

name: FloraMancer: Seeds and Spells
description:
Floramancer: Seeds & Spells is an action/farming game where you grow spells and use them to fight and explore a magical procedurally generated forest.
Grow spells! Fight robots! Save your forest from deforestation.

name: Farsiders
description: 'Farsiders' is a top-down (isometric view) 3D action Hack-and-Slash RPG game set in a stylized futuristic cyberpunk world. Embark on a journey as 'Cassie' to the past with references to real world legends (Arthurian) where the worlds of sci-fi technology and medieval magic collide.

name: The Last Door
description: You control a combat robot. Your task is to go through the maze, destroy all the enemy robots and get to the finish line. The passages to the other rooms of the maze are littered with stones. You need to use bombs to free the passages.

name: The Darkest Paths: Missing Files
description: The Darkest Paths: Night Watch is a Psychological Horror Game in which you slip into shoes of Henry Lawrence, a security guard working for DARWIN.

name: Ozymandias: Aegean Sea
description: Including a new map: Aegean Sea!

name: Shifted Heart
description: Explore, fight, and discover new spells and abilities in the world of Shifted Heart! Customize your build to your liking and save the province of Shutterweld, and perhaps the rest of the world, from certain doom.

name: Glimpse
description: "Step into the heartwrenchingly beautiful immersive animation Glimpse, a short interactive animation of 25 minutes which draws on the power of cinema and the uniqueness of VR storytelling to unravel the story of a breakup... avoidable or unavoidable, that's up to you to decide.

name: Qisah Tomang: Cycle Ends
description: Qisah Tomang: Cycle Ends is a story-rich RPG. The story is set in an East Asia inspired fantasy world. Fight off the Demon Tomang and its minion and discover the truth behind the Cycle of Hatred and put an end to it in this classic pixel RPG.

name: Ascribe
description: Ascribe is a really fast-paced third person MOBA with a strong focus on the player's skill rather than his wallet. Combined with beautiful visuals brought by Unreal Engine 5 and it’s capabilities, Ascribe will deliver absorbing gameplay that we haven’t seen in years.

name: Escape From Lavender Island
description: Escape from Lavender Island is a 3rd person open world exploration game. Follow Zede Aksis as he wakes up from a dream about a city only to realize that what he saw in his sleep is a physical reality he cannot find a way out of.

name: Village Heros
description: Village Heros is a fast-paced roguelike cooperative bullet-hell mmorpg. Fight with friends to defend the village from Shadowlords! Defeat enemies, level up, get better equipments, then permanent death to obtain hero modifiers.

name: Logic: Keypad
description: Puzzle game with numbers. Observe, find and combine clues to open doors. No horror. No storyline. Just Logic!

name: Last Order
description: Last Order is a 2D action game with pixel art style. To recover the "Last Order" in devastated world, you'll use a variety of wire actions.

name: Goi: Let's Play Together
description: Goi: Let's Play Together is an online multiplayer game that combines the elements of Battle Royale and Casual then becomes a Party Survival Game. There will be only one winner in Goi.Try your best to survive the ghost hunt, but OH! Your friends are ghosts too!

name: Darkenstein 3D
description: A retro shooter inspired by the older Wolfenstein and Doom games. A tribute of sorts, if you like, where I aspire emulate the games I love the most and that requires a certain amount of skill to complete, while adding a few personal and more current-day touches.

name: Medieval Defence
description: Medieval Defense is a real-time strategy game with RPG elements. You have to protect the main building from the invasion of orcs and the undead, using his brave army, rebuilding buildings and strengthening the defenses around the kingdom.

name: Soccer Clubs
description: Soccer Clubs Football Manager is a football e-sports game authorized by FIFPro. The game has IP authorization for more than 60000 professional players from more than 54 countries around the world, including Cristiano Ronaldo, Messi, Mbape and so on, creating a luxury football feast for players.

name: Chicago 2020
description: You have been bad. Now the police is coming for you. Escape the city before they catch you. And if you're too slow the city will be locked down.

name: Block Corsair
description: Block Corsair is a game in which you play as an air pirate in a world where airships come and go, engage in battles and loot, strengthen your own airship, and loot some more.

name: Death Nomad
description: Death nomad is a zombie survival game with procedurally generated environments. The environment will force you to improve your equipment, defense and constantly move around the world, prolonging your chances of survive.

name: First Time in Hawaii
description: The sun, the sea — and a wedding in peril!?

name: Constantine
description: Indie MMORPG game, Constantine! Do Adventure And be strong! The Constantine is a world that exists inside Nathan's tree. After spring, summer, autumn and winter, the world goes to sleep.

name: The Island Rescue
description: The Island Rescue is an open world adventure game for survival in the end of the world. The story takes place on an island called Conavika in the South Pacific Ocean. Use all kinds of weapons to fight zombies and mercenaries, save and help virus experts.

name: Broken System
description: BrokenSystem - is a 2D shooter where you need to clear all enemies at all levels. Each of them is a potential enemy of all people. Avoid bullets and give a furious rebuff. Your skills will help you with this. Sleight of hand and good strategy are your best friends.

name: Digital Virus
description: Digital Virus is a side-scrolling 2D parkour platformer. You play as an antivirus that tries to keep your computer free of malware.

name: Mystery Case Files: The Last Resort - Collector's Edition
description: A mission to find a group of missing skiers goes downhill fast when a town’s secrets hit the fresh mountain air!

name: First Odium
description: A prequel to Trash Vomit Studios first videogame "Victim". First Odium is a basic turn based RPG that explores the strange world of the Ominous Oppression from a differentiated minimalist perspective.

name: CucumbeRunner
description: CucumbeRunner is a action platformer in which you have to help the determined Cucumber through many challenges! Jump, do amazing mid-air stunts, collect gems and uncover carefully hidden secrets!

name: TEOM
description: A tower defense game with rogue like elements and engaging levels with environments that change as you progress through the game.

name: No Sun To Worship
description: Sneak into enemy bases, rescue hostages, hack computers and play your own way while you uncover a conspiracy to unearth unspeakable horrors. Stick to the shadows and stop an ancient curse in this mission-based stealth adventure!

name: Airline Flight Attendant Simulator VR
description: This is a consumer version of the professional VR training software developed by AVIAR and used by airlines and flight schools to train future cabin crew members. It's all there - insanely realistic virtual aircraft, equipment, gravity effects, sounds, and intense emergency situations scenarios.

name: Cute Honey: Special Edition
description: Cute Honey: Special Edition is a game with excellent graphics and music. It uses exquisite graphics and gameplay to show a wonderful overhead world, allowing players to enjoy it.

name: Evil Tactics
description: Outsmart evil forces in this minimalist turn-based combat strategy game with telegraphed enemy attacks and no RNG where you control a growing group of survivors who explore a city infested by monsters.

name: Sling Kings: Supercharged Chess
description: Sling Kings is chess, but faster. Aim your spirit and sling it to a piece, then move that piece without worrying about turns. Ricochet your spirit off walls, and make multiple moves in quick succession to outwit your opponent. In supercharged chess, there's no checkmate. Just go for the kill!

name: Lil Spoops
description: Lil Spoops is a 2-4 player top-down supernatural rogue-lite shooter where you play as possessed toys that battle each other to entertain the Entity, which grants players unique powers and abilities at the end of each round.

name: Geometric Hell
description: Geometric Hell is an arcade bullet-hell shooter with minimalistic graphics. Survive waves of aggressive geometric shapes and upgrade to keep up with the progressive increase in difficulty. Many deaths are expected before you get a chance to fight the final boss.

name: Imperiums: Rise of Caesar
description: Imperiums: Rise of Caesar follows the bold conquests of the great general in two linked scenarios, Gaul and the British Isles. It introduces several new mechanics such as weather, seasons, politics in Rome and others. Lead the Roman legions beyond the Alps test your tactical prowess to the limit.

name: Encounter of island
description: This is a world embracing freedom and warmth. Players, as island owners, can build their own beautiful islands at will; You can also become friends with distant NPCs, pacify their wandering hearts, and build a new home for them; You can also become friends with other players to build your town.

name: VetVR: Veterinary Simulator
description: As a brand-new veterinarian, you're tasked with the responsibility of saving animal lives while building your clinic's reputation. Play through real-life veterinary training, discover Easter eggs and unlock rewards as you learn all you need to treat emergencies, heal wounds, and diagnose illnesses.

name: Neon City Survivor
description: Neon city Survivor is a top down arena shooter game that offers various ways of creating builds around skills that can be specialized either on automatic or manual. Take up your weapon and save the city.

name: Piero's Pilgrimage
description: An simple exploration game where you walk a dog.

name: Overwritten: Enter the Net
description: A roguelike deckbuilding card game, and a free entry to the Net. Build your perfect deck and defeat your very first boss!

name: Dust Kingdom
description: Un brouillard mortel recouvre le royaume, affrontez des hordes de monstres lors de périlleuses expéditions à la recherche de la source du mal.

name: Temple of Steel
description: A first person survival horror game where you become trapped in a monumentaly vast place known as the Temple of Steel. Explore and escape it as its chilling abominations attempt to devour your soul, and as you struggle with a personal story of revenge, hatred and guilt.

name: Disavowed
description: Disavowed is a Metroidvania that allows the player to freeze time and set up pinpoint shots to stun enemies. It is set in a world of plush and cute creatures where the player has been cast out and needs to go on a journey to gather more strength and get back at his creator for tossing him out.

name: Chick Rage
description: Chick Rage is a top-down arcade game where the game becomes more and more difficult each time, the levels confuse the player more and more, and the ghost gains more and more powers. Run around the location and beat off disks flying everywhere at the enemy, and most importantly, do not stand still!

name: Towards the Unknown
description: Dive into the Rift and discover the various mysteries it holds. Between mystical creatures and legendary artifacts, you will have to be strategic on this expedition. Die, pass the torch to another explorer and head into the unknown.

name: God Machines
description: A story-driven turn-based RPG set in a post-apocalyptic world where sentient AIs known as God Machines compete over the remnants of a fallen human society.

name: Stellar Echoes
description: You may wonder how the ‘future’ looks like, Stellar Echoes would resonate you with the vision and voice of the imaginary future. Inside the VR world of Stellar Echoes, let us witness then define the future together; moreover, feel free to stay in touch with Li，wave at it and say ‘Hi’!

name: Mecha Blade
description: As Edgar Grey, chosen by the Angel Uriel to operate the Behemoth Mecha Suit to save the nuclear devastated world from the evil lord Zebul. Command you and your army to change the course of the world. What will you make of this new world in this intense Mecha SRPG?

name: 2 Many Pixels
description: 2 Many Pixels is an endless & fast-paced 2D minimal shooter. Blast enemies & unlock upgrades to help you survive for as long as possible!

name: Gachi: Christmas Party
description: Welcome to "Gachi: Christmas Party " a visual novel filled with hilarious and heartwarming moments set against the backdrop of a festive holiday party. Will you find love under the mistletoe or will you end up alone with only your eggnog for company? The choice is yours!

name: Rhapsody of the Moon Rabbit
description: Rhapsody of the Moon Rabbit is a second player game in Valkyrie Studio. You will operate Reisen Udongein Inaba and Youmu Konpaku,smash the plot of the scientific eccentric.

name: Lilith
description: Do you enjoy non-stop, high-intensity, combat while fighting hordes of enemies? Come play Lilith and find yourself engulfed in this experience!

name: Super Bawk Bawk Chicken
description: Super Bawk Bawk Chicken is an infinite runner where you play as a charming chicken with super powers.

name: Woman Communication
description: It often happens that lewd words are inadvertently made up in conversation, doesn't it? This game is probably the world's first adventure game where you will find such "inadvertent lewd words" to advance the game!

name: Squared
description: A small grid-based puzzle game where you take control of a square. Move around the blocks and walls, change gravity and overcome obstacles to reach the Exit Portal.

name: Short Horror Story
description: An unexpected visitor turns a peaceful night in the desert into a terrifying nightmare. An horror FPS made in two weeks, Short Horror Story, is a non linear horror tale that develops in a creepy shooter game.

name: Jack & Kenne
description: Jack and Kenne is a Beat up, which takes place in a comic book, the player will control an Alligator named Jack and he intends to save Kenne the Rabbit, she was kidnapped by Marcos the Deer!! Jack will have to go from page to page facing Marcos' gang to save Kenne.

name: Five Nights at Tinky's
description: Five nights at Tinky's is a indie horror game, where you apply for a job as a nightguard at the "Tinkys Lasagne Place". You only need to work for 5 nights to receive your payment, but soon you will find out that you are not alone... Can you survive the 5 nights?

name: A Millionaire's Story
description: In A Millionaire’s Story, you run a start-up. Make sure your clients are satisfied by managing the resources and the employees. Make decisions to overcome the challenges. Improve yourself as a leader and discover the perfect strategies to build a million-dollar business.

name: Hentai Ojou
description: Hentai Ojou is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of young lady and 24 unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Heavy Duty Construction
description: Heavy Duty Construction - Take a seat at the controls of many realistic construction machines. Raise buildings, renovate or demolish them, using specialized machines. And all of this in the climatic world of the Netherlands!

name: Deathmans Island
description: Sin descripción

name: Ashcrown
description: Ashcrown is a turn-based PvP game that’ll test your strategic mettle. Combining the champion-based gameplay of MOBAs with the depth of strategy games like chess, every decision you make will determine if you’ll achieve glorious victory or crushing defeat.

name: Spark Defense
description: Spark Defense is a high-stakes hero-driven, multiplayer MOBA defense game that lets you play your way. Go on the defense, play it boldly, or mix it up. Keep your hero alive and your harvester running. Mine sparkite and emerge a champion!

name: Ozymandias: Sahara Desert
description: Including a new map: Sahara Desert!

name: Sacred Earth: Alternative
description: As a lone girl who has awoken after a long slumber, travel through a broken world to remember just what happened, and where all of your friends have gone in this short, post-apocalyptic fantasy Visual Novel/JRPG with tabletop inspired elements.

name: Knightward
description: Construct automated defenses and brave treacherous dungeons in this action-packed roguelike. Invite up to 3 friends as you defend a crystal from endless waves of enemies and collect powerful items. Can you outlast the competition in this tower defense dungeon-crawling hybrid?

name: Mad King
description: Collect heroes in this mysterious land, and try your hand in the fast-paced PvP card battles! Utilize unique hero skills to strategize your hand and win the fights!

name: Maxix Robotics
description: Survive the night in this Survival Horror environment as you navigate a Historic Robotics Facility by solving puzzles in various wings of the factory. By utilizing a Robotic companion called 'DOTT' you can open doors, activate terminals and more... Just make sure to look behind you.

name: The Gametrekking Omnibus
description: A collection of tiny experimental games (and "notgames") inspired by travel.

name: Muscle Giants
description: Action shooting to protect the world from giant machos.

name: Colorful Dotlines
description: Colorful Dotlines is an abstract puzzle game about colors. Never repeat a color in the same line when completing the missing dots. Suitable for color blindness.

name: Druidwalker
description: You are a druid preparing the forest for winter. Traverse the paths at your own pace, meet the animals, enjoy the music, all wrapped in a peaceful roguelike experience.

name: Webcam Sex
description: Webcam Sex - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Snow Folks
description: Discover the magic of a winter wonderland with Snow Folks! You can build snow forts, houses and anything you can imagine. Get creative with your friends in the ultimate snowball fight, or play solo and create your own snow day adventure!

name: Shitty Fish: High Speed Combat Arena
description: Shitty Fish is an action adventure about becoming alive! Built around speed, this small open world pushes the boundaries of what is possible in movement based gameplay.

name: Inner Universe 1F0000
description: This 360° STG offers the tension of a dogfight and a turn-based strategy. As a hero with the superpower of time-stopping, you fight, talk, and maintain your aircraft in the inner universe, aiming to save everything in the world.

name: Cartastrophe
description: In Cartastrophe, the goal is to collect shopping carts and bring them back to the store. But be careful, they are hard to control and could send you hurling at a car! Find your own path and avoid obstacles.

name: Abhorrent Light
description: A dark medieval first person hack and slash with procedural elements. Navigate the darkness and shed light on what lies below.

name: Rina to Akumu no Kan
description: One day, the unlucky girl "Runa Ichiya" wakes up in a haunted house.

name: Animal Survivors
description: Animal Survivors is a casual game with elements of a simplified roguelike. A time-based survival game with minimalistic gameplay and elements of a simplified roguelike.

name: The Rifle Man
description: The Rifle Man 2D is a indie game which includes shooting of enemies, it is a single player game and off-line game ,it is available for both android ,windows ,mac and IOS

name: Oniami
description: A journey across vast lands.

name: Hightail
description: How far can you survive? This game will give you a challenge to survive the wildlands and collect miles as you drift in unknown direction and try to avoid obstacles.

name: Cosmo Blaster
description: Simple yet fun top-down blaster with power-ups

name: Grombiez save souls
description: You wake up in the anchor of evil transformed into a zombie "Grombiez" your spirit is awakened, you decide to leave this place taking as much spirit as possible with you, beware evil is here to stop you, good luck. 2D game, action, Arcade with 20 fairly hard progressive difficulty levels.

name: Wild Growth TD
description: Grow out your defenses and defend against waves of invasive enemies. Manage resources, explore further out into the wilds, and strengthen your grove. Wild Growth TD combines tower defense with real time strategy and rogue-lite elements.

name: Orc Covenant
description: Gorgeously illustrated with hundreds of images, Orc Covenant is a sextacular romp into a fantasy realm full of sultry elves and beefy well-endowed orcs!

name: Death Unphased
description: Death Unphased is a challenging precision platformer where you phase through walls, spikes, and enemies with your dash. A short arcade-like experience with the goal of beating your fastest time in each level. Flex your puzzle-solving and speedrunning abilities as you forge the best path to the exit door.

name: Dummy Pirates: Ocean Tales
description: From the Planet Chromatica, the first 3D TPS sailing MOBA game! Become the King-of-Dummies by competing and winning in deadly matches, while exploring the wonders of the Ocean Tales.

name: Holo & Veil
description: Unearth the past as you delve into the underground ruins of an ancient spacecraft. Battle mechanized foes, encounter curious characters, and discover lost relics during your subterranean sci-fi journey through this RPG adventure.

name: Korlax Escape!
description: Take control of a quirky UFO as Korlax and take on the challenges in this adventurous 3D Side-scroller through multiple levels! You must Escape!

name: Pixel Town: Akanemachi Mystery
description: Welcome to the small, quaint town of Akanemachi. Eerie disturbances have been popping up after a recent earthquake, shaking up the residents' lives. Aya, a perfectly normal woman of the town, takes it upon herself to investigate the mysteries and banish the looming evil.

name: Castillo: The Nine Circles
description: Embark on a journey through the nine circles of Hell, using unique abilities and weapons to defeat enemies and solve puzzles in this retro FPS inspired by 90's classics. Explore Dracula's origins on his quest to restore balance to the multiverse.

name: Reach the Hilltop
description: Reach the Hilltop - 2D platformer where you have to go through levels to get to the hilltop!

name: Ultra Pro Wrestling
description: An arcade wrestling game.

name: Hentai Doctor 2049
description: Take control over the medical center of the future! Will you stay calm in time of diagnostic procedure or let your assistant carry out the deep examination?

name: The Book: Gunsmith's Battles Echoes
description: The Book is a fast-paced, action-packed first-person shooter set in a world inhabited by pirates and fantasy creatures, featuring a rapid gameplay loop inspired by recent Doom games. Become a stronger fighter by crafting powerful weapons mixing magic and retro technology as described in "The Book".

name: Tetris Christmas
description: A Christmas themed tetris and lofi music to relax and spend time pleasantly and peacefully. With story mode to challenge yourself by going through increasingly difficult levels and infinite mode to get more and more points.

name: The Kinky Kitsune and The Tantalizing Tanuki
